reviews.text: Noted — this is the third merge-tag failure this month.
We need to address this head-on: please implement regression tests specifically for the merge-tag parser to prevent recurrence.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes the necessity to implement regression tests.

reviews.text: Also set up real-time monitoring of email render errors, with auto-alerts to #email-ops if the failure rate exceeds 0.1%.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes real-time monitoring and alerting behavior.

reviews.text: This will ensure rapid awareness and triage.
reviews.reason_text: Ensures rapid awareness and triage behavior.

reviews.text: Finally, the fix must be developed, tested, and deployed no later than Friday 18:00 UTC.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes a performance constraint by the deadline.

reviews.text: Let’s close this loop properly — confirm ownership and ETA by EOD.
reviews.reason_text: Instruction on task completion without enforceable action.
